articles.title: About Me
articles.description: BYU-Idaho graduate with a Bachelor’s (BS) in Software Engineering. I also earned a minor in Computer Engineering and Data Science. I have over three years of tutoring and teaching experience. I love helping people learn new things and learn new things for myself.
